description: Two positive hemocultures with a same pathogene should not be repeated within 14 days from the first episode
If the two positive hemocultures appear in different stays for the same patient it should count as 2 episodes to investigate for HUG but only 1 for PRAISE
Two positive hemocultures with a different pathogene should count as 2 episodes

Two positive hemocultures with a different pathogene in two different days should count as 2 episodes for HUG because there is no link between pathogenes but only 1 for PRAISE because they are within the 3 days time window
Two positive hemocultures with a different pathogene in the same days counts as 1 polymicrobial episode for both HUG and PRAISE
scenario commensals (repeat intervals) (requires some work?) patient_1012
